review_data.title: Lovely experience
review_data.content: Great food, great atmosphere, great location. What more is there to say? Amazing Bratwurst and great cold beer - does a day get any better?

review_data.title: Nice stand to buy ice cream
review_data.content: I just picked up some ice cream from this small stand near the river. It was quick and inexpensive, but the ice cream was good. I would go there again if in the area.
